card_name: The American ExpressÂ® Singapore Airlines Business Credit Card
eligibility: Card application is subjected to customers meeting the regulatory minimum income requirement and internal assessment.
Applicant should be a business owner and/or person with executive authority of a Company/Business with a valid UEN

key_features: Earn 1.8 HighFlyer points per S$1 spent on all eligible purchases (worth 1.8 KrisFlyer miles)
Earn up to 8.5 HighFlyer points per S$1 spent on eligible Singapore Airlines and Scoot flights (worth 8.5 KrisFlyer miles)
Complimentary Accor Plus membership worth S$418 offering a free nights stay every year and up to 50% dining discounts
Priority Pass membership with two complimentary visits per year for you and a guest worth S$221
Get 5,000 HighFlyer points when you spend S$500 with Singapore Airlines Group in the first 12 months
Get 15,000 HighFlyer points when you spend S$10,000 with Singapore Airlines Group annually
Accelerate to KrisFlyer Elite Gold status when you spend S$15,000 with Singapore Airlines Group in the first year
Up to 51 days interest-free from transaction date
Complimentary Hertz Gold Status with 10% off standard rates, one car class upgrade and the additional driver fee waived
HighFlyer points are valid for 3 years and can be redeemed to pay for your Singapore Airlines bookings in part or in full, no caps and blackout dates
Convert HighFlyer points to KrisFlyer miles with a 1:1 rate, up to 100,000 miles per KrisFlyer account annually with no limit on the number of KrisFlyer accounts linked.
Refer to the American Express website for the most up to date information on card benefits and its Terms & Conditions.

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.

fees.interest_free_period: 21 days from statement date if closing balance is paid in full
fees.annual_interest_rate: 26.90% p.a. compounded if payment of the closing balance in your statements is not made in full; or 29.99% p.a. in the event that your account has three or more defaults in the last 12 months
fees.late_payment_fee: S$100 if minimum monthly payment is not made by due date

minimum_income.singaporean_pr: Singaporean/PR Minimum Income Card application is subjected to customers meeting the regulatory minimum income requirement and internal assessment
minimum_income.non_singaporean: Non-Singaporean Minimum Income Card application is subjected to customers meeting the regulatory minimum income requirement and internal assessment
